page.title: 15Visitors views, Hopton.
page.content: The places where the holiday makers were staying are: 21 = Ponderosa, 17 = Holimarine, 3 = potter's, (Potter's wasn't in our square,) & 4 others were staying either in hotels or with friends. There wasn't a general place where the majority of people came from. Most people had looked in magazines, papers or found out from a friend about Hopton. A few people had just come to the area on speck. It was near enough a 50/50 split on the no. of people who had come before.80% of the people would come again. Many people thought entertainment was adaquate but could be improved with more things for the younger generation.
